content: Bio Father. Husbsand. Pastafari. The one who loves developing software. Manufactured in 1971 in Barcelona (Spain) Programming things for the last 30+ years. In love with C#, Java, SQL, software architecture, async patterns & more. Ex-teacher, Blogger, Speaker, Geek & family guy, living in Andorra since 2001. Microsoft MVP 2002-2016, MAP, MCC Active member and moderator in the good old MS newsgroups and forums for almost two decades. Founder of AndorraDotNet, the first dotNet user group in the country. Host of several events, like Geek-a-palooza. Now in a well deserved retirement
title: About me

content: I like Coding. Family. Mountains. Sports. Food. Nature. Feminism. Human rights. Scifi. Fantasy. Traveling. Science. Atheism.

content: I dislike Anti-vaxxers. Racism. Religious fundamentalists. Pseudoscience. Lack of imagination or proud on ignorance. Politicians.
